synopsis.text: Encounter of Shadow-work (ES) agents Éclair and Lumière, celebrated heroes from the original Kiddy Grade series, once secured the galaxy's fate in a decisive battle. Twenty-five years later, the Galactic Trade Organization (GTO), established after the downfall of the Galactic Organization of Trade and Tariffs (GOTT), maintains peace by combating criminal activity. The GTO's special ES division, modeled after the GOTT's ES force, now includes publicly recognized ES member candidates. Enter Ascoeur and Q-feuille, two promising trainees working as waitresses at the galactic government headquarters while honing their skills to become full-fledged ES Members. As the galaxy teeters on the edge of chaos once more, these two new heroines rise to the challenge, poised to leave their mark on history.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
